verses.verse: All the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>, that ye may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> all the <S%H1870>way<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H3212>led<s%> thee these <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that he might <S%H6031>humble<s%> <S%H5254>thee<s%>, to prove <S%H3045>thee<s%>, to know what was in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, whether thou wouldest <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, or not.

And he <S%H6031>humbled<s%> <S%H7456>thee<s%>, and suffered thee to hunger, and <S%H398>fed<s%> thee with <S%H4478>manna<s%>, which thou <S%H3045>knewest<s%> <S%H1>not<s%>, neither did thy fathers <S%H3045>know<s%>; that he might make thee <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> doth not <S%H2421>live<s%> by <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H905>only<s%>, but by everything that <S%H4161>proceedeth<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> doth <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>.
Thy <S%H8071>raiment<s%> waxed not <S%H1086>old<s%> upon <S%H7272>thee<s%>, neither did thy foot <S%H1216>swell<s%>, these <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3045>consider<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, <S%H376>that<s%>, as a man <S%H3256>chasteneth<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, so <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> chasteneth <S%H3256>thee<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to fear <S%H3372>him<s%>.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>bringeth<s%> thee into a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, of <S%H5869>fountains<s%> and <S%H8415>springs<s%>, flowing <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H1237>valleys<s%> and <S%H2022>hills<s%>;

a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H1612>vines<s%> and <S%H8384>fig-trees<s%> and <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>; a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2132>olive<s%> - <S%H8081>trees<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>;

a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4544>scarceness<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H2637>lack<s%> anything in <S%H776>it<s%>; a land whose <S%H68>stones<s%> are <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and out of whose <S%H2042>hills<s%> thou mayest <S%H2672>dig<s%> <S%H5178>copper<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> for the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which he hath given <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> lest thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, in not <S%H8104>keeping<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>:
lest <S%H398><s%>, when thou hast eaten and art <S%H7646>full<s%>, and hast <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427>therein<s%>;

and when thy <S%H1241>herds<s%> and thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, and thy <S%H3701>silver<s%> and thy <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and all that thou hast is <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>;

then thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up<s%>, and thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, who brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>;

who <S%H3212>led<s%> thee through the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, wherein were <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents<s%> and <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>, and <S%H6774>thirsty<s%> ground where was no <S%H4325>water<s%>; who brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H2496>flint<s%>;

who <S%H398>fed<s%> thee in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> with <S%H4478>manna<s%>, which thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H6031>not<s%>; that he might humble <S%H5254>thee<s%>, and that he might prove <S%H3190>thee<s%>, to do thee good at thy latter <S%H319>end<s%>:
and lest thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>, My <S%H3581>power<s%> and the <S%H6108>might<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H6213>gotten<s%> me this <S%H2428>wealth<s%>.

But thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, for it is he that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H6213>get<s%> <S%H2428>wealth<s%>; that he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And it shall <S%H7911>be<s%>, if thou shalt <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them<s%>, and worship <S%H5749>them<s%>, I testify against you this <S%H3117>day<s%> that ye shall <S%H6>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>.

As the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> maketh to <S%H6>perish<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>, so shall ye <S%H6>perish<s%>; <S%H6118>because<s%> ye would not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
